message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.COM. 

The paper deals with rate performance in a multiuser MIMO broadcast channel, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT). The use of a rate-splitting approach to tackle multiuser interference is also related to networked systems (cs.NI) and signal processing (cs.SI). The paper specifically focuses on the large-scale array regime, which is a topic related to massive MIMO (cs.MM). Finally, the paper proposes a novel framework for hierarchical-rate-splitting, which is a topic related to communication and networking (cs.COM).
